QuestData.Title: Back to Nature
QuestData.Description: I'm afraid I have another favor to ask, $n.$B$BThe bottles you recovered contain neither the spirits of mogu ancestors nor recently slain foes; they contain spirits of beasts. It seems the spiritclaws have resorted to poaching in an effort to fuel their simulacra.$B$BThis complicates our task, for I cannot take the beasts with me through the bridge.$B$BTake the bottles west to Tideview Thicket and smash them to return the spirits to nature. Some may be blind with rage and will need to be subdued.
QuestData.LogDescription: Throw Spirit Bottles on the ground in Tideview Thicket to release 8 Beast Spirits.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do not fear for the spirits of the beasts - they will find peace here.
QuestData.RewardText: Their bodies had long since returned to the land - their spirits can now follow.
